LG 55" Class 1080p 120Hz Cinema 3D Smart TV

Smart TVs, with their built-in WiFi and panoply of streaming services, are much better than Mean TVs, which tend to shame you for watching reality television. Essentially a 55" computer, this LG model includes a dual-core processor and DLNA compatibility, which means you can use the TV to stream films and music from your home network. Four pairs of 3D glasses let you and your friends take full advantage of the TV's ability to convert 2D entertainment into immersive 3D.

says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Fall Movie Season
says.websiteContent:
It's fall movie season and you know what that means! All your favorites are back—the actors, the directors, the lights, and the sounds. So buy the popcorn and chew the candies because here come the movies!
 
**_Maids of Dishonor_:** Five clumsy women are all getting married on the same day and they're all each other's bridesmaids.
 
**_The Rotten House by the Airport_:** This house has a dirty rotten secret—about eating teens. 
 
**_Time Fireman 2_:** Now he's putting out fires in the Renaissance and for the Pilgrims.
 
**_Important Dog_:** A girl's dog is really important to her, but then she is sick, and so is the dog. 
 
**_The Unexpected Family_:** When nobody on the block has anyone to spend Christmas with, guess who becomes a family? Them. 
 
**_Touch Down Under_:** An Australian boomerang team has to learn to play football because of a loophole in the rules. 
 
**_Oops, Wrong Bodies_:** When two men are getting surgery at the same time and lightning strikes the doctor's hands, can business man be nice and can nice man make business happen?
says.websiteContentHtml:
It's fall movie season and you know what that means! All your favorites are back—the actors, the directors, the lights, and the sounds. So buy the popcorn and chew the candies because here come the movies!

Maids of Dishonor: Five clumsy women are all getting married on the same day and they're all each other's bridesmaids.

The Rotten House by the Airport: This house has a dirty rotten secret—about eating teens.

Time Fireman 2: Now he's putting out fires in the Renaissance and for the Pilgrims.

Important Dog: A girl's dog is really important to her, but then she is sick, and so is the dog.

The Unexpected Family: When nobody on the block has anyone to spend Christmas with, guess who becomes a family? Them.

Touch Down Under: An Australian boomerang team has to learn to play football because of a loophole in the rules.

Oops, Wrong Bodies: When two men are getting surgery at the same time and lightning strikes the doctor's hands, can business man be nice and can nice man make business happen?

deals.announcementTitle: Up to 96% Off a Chiropractic Package with Massage
deals.pitchHtml:
Misaligned vertebrae can disrupt the flow of information through the body's nervous system, resulting in bad things, such as pain, but also cool things, such as the inability to feel pain. Strengthen your spine with this Groupon.

Choose Between Two Options

$39 for a two-visit chiropractic package (a $920 total value)

  • Complete chiropractic evaluation and consultation (a $335 value)
  • Two chiropractic adjustments (a $250 value)
  • Two therapies per visit—choose from traction therapy, electromagnetic stimulation, and ultrasound therapy (a $170 value)
  • One 60-minute Swedish, deep-tissue, or fire-cupping massage (a $165 value)

$79 for a three-visit chiropractic package (a $1,130 total value)

  • Complete chiropractic evaluation and consultation (a $335 value)
  • Three chiropractic adjustments (a $375 value)
  • Two therapies per visit—choose from traction therapy, electromagnetic stimulation, and ultrasound therapy (a $255 value)
  • One 60-minute Swedish, deep-tissue, or fire-cupping massage (a $165 value)

The chiropractor begins the treatment by evaluating the client's stature and determining the root causes of issues such as migraines, joint discomfort, and back pain. He then adjusts misaligned vertebrae to relieve pressure before harnessing additional therapies to further banish pain. Ultrasounds send massaging waves deep into muscles to decrease inflammation, electrical stimulation causes muscles to repeatedly contract to release tension, and spinal traction works to realign off-kilter discs. Massage therapists work out knots from muscles with a choice of massage styles including fire cupping, in which a lit cotton ball is placed into a cup on the back to create a vacuum that's believed to increase blood and lymph flow for healthy circulation. The fire-cupping technique is only available at the massage therapist's discretion.

Set Contents

  • Twin: two flat sheets (66"x96"), two fitted sheets (39"x75"+12"), two pillowcases (20"x30")
  • Full: two flat sheets (80"x90"), two fitted sheets (54"x75"+12"), four pillowcases (20"x30")
  • Queen: two flat sheets (85"x95"), two fitted sheets (60"x80"+12"), four pillowcases (20"x30")
  • King: two flat sheets (95"x100"), two fitted sheets (78"x80"+12"), four pillowcases (20"x40")

Royal London Collection Microfiber Sheets

  • Two smooth microfiber sheet sets
  • Variety of colors
  • Easy to care for
  • Subtle patterns match a variety of decor
  • 100% microfiber
  • Machine wash cold, no bleach; tumble dry low

deals.pitchHtml:
300-psi Air Compressor

When tires aren't properly inflated, cars get significantly lower gas mileage and are at a greater risk of getting a flat. This portable air compressor helps to ensure that vehicles' wheels are filled with the optimal amount of air. Inflating tires is as simple as plugging the pump into a standard cigarette lighter outlet and attaching the universal adapter to the tire valve. The unit also has a built-in pressure gauge and comes with a needle attachment for pumping up sports equipment.

  • Plug into car cigarette lighter
  • Pressure: 300 psi
  • Pressure gauge
  • Universal adapter for car tires
  • Inflate footballs, soccer balls, and biceps

deals.announcementTitle: Up to 54% Off at Bounce! Trampoline Sports
deals.pitchHtml:
Before trampolines, flying through the air was an experience reserved only for birds, champagne corks, and the crumpled pages of failed novelists. Succeed where others did not with this Groupon.

Choose from Four Options

  • $35 for a two-hour all access jump pass for two, redeemable Monday–Friday ($64 value)
  • $65 for a two-hour all access jump pass for four, redeemable Monday–Friday ($128 value)
  • $30 for a two-hour all access jump pass for two, redeemable Monday–Thursday ($64 value)
  • $59 for a two-hour all access jump pass for four, redeemable Monday–Thursday ($128 value)

Guests launch into impressive leaps and somersaults across inflatable structures, trampoline courts, and a trampoline bungee jump, all of which line the walls and floor with bounce-ready surfaces. During open bounce time, they can perfect midair tricks, dunk basketballs, play dodge ball, and soar into the foam pit for soft landings. Check out the calendar for open bounce times, and click here for FAQs.

TomFord Noir Men's Eau de Parfum Spray

  • Sensual, oriental fragrance for men
  • Top notes: bergamot oil, verbena, violet flower, caraway oil, baie rose,
  • Mid notes: Bulgarian rose, geranium oil, Tuscan iris resinoid, styrax oil,black pepper oil, nutmeg, clary sage
  • Base notes: patchouli oil, vetiver, leather, benzoin, vanilla, opoponax, amber civet
  • 3.4 fl. oz.
  • Elegant black bottle
AboutTom Ford

In 2005, after a decade-long stint at Gucci, TomFord launched his eponymous brand. In addition to a collection of optical frames and sunglasses, he partnered with Estée Lauder to produce a beauty line with fragrances and cosmetics. Next, he launched a menswear and accessory collection and opened his New York flagship store, whose doors appear only by tapping a certain nondescript brick four times. His women’s-wear collection debuted with participation from style icons such as Lauren Hutton and Beyoncé.In addition to winning five separate honors from the Council of FashionDesigners of America, Ford has snagged British GQ’sInternational Man of the Year Award, title of Best Fashion Designer byTIME Magazine, GQ USA’s Designer of theYear, and GQ Russia’s Man of the Decade.

To complete your Goods order, simply purchase this Groupon and provide your name and shipping address.

Please check the Fine Print for this deal’s estimated delivery timeframe. We work with thousands of brands to deliver the amazing selection you see on Groupon Goods, and this shipping window ensures we have enough time to coordinate with our suppliers to get you the products you love.

For questions pertaining to this deal, click the Ask a Question button below. For post-purchase inquiries, please contact Groupon customer support.

When blouses and suits get rumpled inside a suitcase, this handheld travel steamer is there to make it all right. The 60mL reservoir quickly heats up to provide about 10 minutes of steam at a whopping 265W of power, plenty to release most wrinkles from clothing and steam up a batch of dumplings to boot. The automatic power-off kicks in when water runs low and helps prevent leftover water from overheating.

adidas Men's Comfort Low-Cut Socks

  • Ankle-length athletic socks
  • Moisture-wicking fabric keeps feet dry and cool
  • Padding adds comfort
  • Midfoot compression panel provides support
  • Size 9–12
  • Made from cotton and spandex

About adidas

At age 20, athlete Adolf "Adi" Dassler set out to craft shoes that would help athletes reach their full potential and avoid injury. His timing was unfortunate: just after World War I, raw materials were scarce. Still, he managed to acquire enough canvas to construct his first pair. After only a few years, his footwear became wildly popular. In 1928, several athletes wore his shoes while competing, with one runner capturing a gold medal and setting a world record.

His real breakthrough came, however, at the 1954 World Cup championship game between Germany and Hungary—remembered in soccer lore as the Miracle of Bern. The field was a muddy swamp, and Dassler outfitted the long-shot German team with screw-in studs, and they won their country's first World Cup. The studs marked a turning point for not only for Dassler’s company but also soccer teams and pristine grass fields around the world.

QFX Portable Tailgater PA Speaker with Bluetooth

Ideal for tailgating, coups d'état, and other kinds of outdoor gatherings, this portable PA speaker lends crowd-pleasing loudness to music. Whether tunes are streamed over Bluetooth, read from a USB drive, or channeled from an iPod via a standard 3.5 mm line-in cable, the unit's two 8" woofers and 1.5" tweeter pump out sound at up to 600 watts to ensure that everyone at the party is sufficiently inspired to move to the rhythm. An included remote control makes it easy to play DJ from across the room, whereas the seven-band equalizer lets users fine-tune the output to suit any party space.

Dell Inspiron 15.6" Laptop (Manufacturer Refurbished)

Dell's Inspiron laptop delivers excellent all-around performance to handle everyday computing tasks, such as answering emails, watching YouTube clips, and pretending to not notice event invites. The 15.6" display with Truelife technology offers HD graphics that gain deeper color and sharper resolution thanks to LED backlighting. An AMD 1.7 GHz quad-core processor teams with 8GB RAM system memory to speedily run programs and downloadable Windows 8 apps, such as Netflix or Facebook. A 1TB hard drive gives you plenty of room for documents, photos, movies, and music files. The Inspiron further enhances its entertainment and communications capabilities with features such as a webcam and Waves Maxx Audio 4.0.

  • Product number: M531R
  • 15.6" LED backlit display
  • Truelife technology and HD resolution (1366x768)
  • Windows 8.1 64-bit operating system
  • AMD A8-5545M 1.7 GHz quad-core accelerated processor
  • 8GB RAM system memory
  • 1TB hard drive
  • AMD integrated graphics
  • Waves Maxx Audio 4.0

  • Bluetooth 4.0 + LE

About Dell

Michael Dell has always been a little bit ahead of the pack. At the age of 16, he was running a personal stamp auction and newspaper subscription service, and earning more money than his high school Economics teacher. As a freshman at the University of Texas, he was building and selling computers while his classmates were busy dissecting the latest Air Supply record. By 27, Dell had earned a ranking on the Fortune 500. The youngest CEO to do so.

Dell's drive for innovation became the core that powered Dell Inc. His belief that "technology [should be] about enabling human potential" helped cement the company as the cornerstone of the PC revolution, especially once the advent of the Internet kickstarted the brand's enthusiastic embrace of online sales and customer service. Today, Dell remains a reliable name in PC desktops, laptops, and accessories for work or home, especially with the company's unique customizable features.

Options

Low Profile
  • Twin: mattress (38"x75"x11.75"); box spring (38"x75"x5")
  • Full: mattress (54"x75"x11.75"); box spring (54"x75"x5")
  • Queen: mattress (60"x80"x11.75"); box spring (60"x80"x 5")
  • Split Queen: mattress (60"x80"x11.75"); 2 box springs each (30"x80"x 5")
  • King: mattress (76"x80"x11.75"); two box springs (38"x80"x5")
  • Cal King: mattress (72"x84"x11.75"); two box springs (36"x84"x5")
Standard
  • Twin: mattress (38"x75"x11.75"); box spring (38"x75"x9")
  • Full: mattress (54"x75"x11.75"); box spring (54"x75"x9")
  • Queen: mattress (60"x80"x11.75"); box spring (60"x80"x 9")
  • Split Queen: mattress (60"x80"x11.75"); 2 box springs each (30"x80"x 9")
  • King: mattress (76"x80"x11.75"); two box springs (38"x80"x9")
  • Cal King: mattress (72"x84"x11.75"); two box springs (36"x84"x9")

Free White Glove delivery includes unpacking and basic setup of the mattress, as well as removal of boxes, packaging materials, and the old mattress.

Sealy Posturepedic Classic Series Wareham Plush Mattress Set

Sealy's Wareham mattress set gives you consistent support, night after night, with Posturepedic coils made of twice-tempered titanium alloy steel. Precompressed ActiveFlex foam enhances the coils' responsiveness for a more refined conforming action. The CoreSupport System places extra density in the center third of the mattress, which helps support your back, hips, and upper legs and extends the life of the mattress. To maximize the available sleeping area, Sealy's SolidEdge System places a solid seating edge around the mattress perimeter. Last, the rubberized StayTight Foundation helps hold sheets in place and minimizes shifting.

  • Twice-tempered Posturepedic titanium classic coils
  • CoreSupport Center with memory foam
  • Prestressed ActiveFlex foams
  • SolidEdge System
  • StayTight rubberized foundation
  • Mattress depth: 11.75"
  • 10-year nonprorated warranty
  • Made in the USA
  • Sealy FAQ page

About Sealy

A mattress filled with cotton. Such was the request received by cotton gin builder Daniel Haynes in 1881. Haynes, a resident of Sealy, Texas, obliged and soon was inundated with orders for the plush mattresses. Within a few years, Haynes sold his patents to a larger company, and Sealy’s cotton-filled mattresses became a coveted item in American homes, replacing older models filled with straw and retired slinkies. Well over a century later, the company remains committed to scientifically based innovations that can improve one’s quality of sleep. With insight from the company’s in-house Orthopedic Advisory Board and testing at the Pressure Mapping Center of Excellence, each mattress faces considerable scrutiny before it can earn the name “Sealy.”

says.title: The Groupon Guide to: Football Statistics
says.websiteContent:
Football box scores only list the most popular football statistic—touchdowns—but there are actually millions of other statistics kept each game. Here are some lesser-known football stats that you should be familiar with if you ever want people to call you Professor Pigskinsworth: * **YAS:** Yards After Smiling
* **TOPA**: Time of Playing Around
* **INTTFG:** Interceptions Thrown for Goofs
* **ST:** Soft Tackles
* **QBRPN:** Quarterback Rating Post Nap
* **PBHF:** Points Before High-Fiving
* **PAHF:** Points After High-Fiving
* **PDHF:** Points During High-Fiving
* **PTCIC:** Passes to Child in Crowd
* **SRSSSCCY:** Slow Runs So Someone Can Catch
* **LRWSD:** Longest Run While Silly Dancing
* **OFHIU:** On-Field Ham-It-Ups
* **HUGS:** Hugs
* **TDS:** Totally Dreamy Substitutions

deals.announcementTitle: 51% Off Indian Meal at Maharaja Palace
deals.pitchHtml:
Authentic Indian cuisine employs bread in the place of a knife and fork, just as authentic medieval restaurants employ burps to replace paying the bill. Enjoy the more refined culinary tradition with this Groupon.

$29 for Indian Meal for Two (Up to $58.75 Value)

  • One appetizer
  • Two entrees
  • Two basic rice dishes
  • One order of bread

The [menu](http://maharajapalace.us/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=1290&Itemid=618) begins with appetizers such as vegetable samosas and chicken pakora, then moves into entrees such as chicken saag with spinach, spicy lamb vindaloo, or tandoori-grilled prawn masala. Each entree can be paired with one basic rice dish: steamed basmati rice, peas pulao, or lemon rice basmati rice.

Panasonic LZ30 16MP, 35X Zoom SLR-Style Camera

This all-in-one camera offers the professional control of classic DSLR-style cameras in a compact point and shoot. A large 3" LCD display sits on the rear of the device, displaying crisp visuals of your camera's target. A high-powered zoom lens moves in and out to offer an optical sight magnified up to 35 times, all the while capturing images in hefty 16.1MP resolution. In addition to still images shot with the help of the wide-angle-capable lens, the camera can help auteurs take in and output HD video at a resolution of 720p. Other features include fun and creative image effects such as sepia tone and an image stabilizer to aid photo shoots taken while receiving a bear hug.

  • Product numbers:
    • Black: DMC-LZ30K
  • Large 3" LCD screen
  • 16.1 megapixel resolution
  • 25 mm ultra-wide-angle lens
  • 35x optical zoom lens
  • 78.8x extra optical zoom
  • 720p HD video
  • Creative effects such as sepia, retro, and Terminator
  • Image stabilizer
  • Manual exposure setting
  • Batteries: four AA (included)
  • Dimensions: 4.87"x3.3"x3.6"

In the box: camera, batteries, shoulder strap, lens cap, cap string, AV cable, USB cable, CD-ROM, user manual

deals.pitchHtml:
Mota Apple-Certified Battery Case for iPhone 5/5s

Unlike most smartphone cases, Mota's iPhone 5/5s MFI case not only shields cellphones from accidental drops, but also provides them with some extra juice so their batteries can run longer. The ultra-thin case's built-in extended battery almost doubles the iPhone's normal battery life, allowing up to 8 hours of talking, 8 hours of web browsing, or 255 hours of standby time. With easy access to all ports and buttons, the extended battery case doesn't sacrifice any of the phone's normal functions, such as playing music through its speakers, snapping pictures with its camera, or transforming into a doorstop.

  • Ultra-thin protective iPhone 5/5s case
  • Built-in 2,400mAh extended battery
  • Nearly doubles iPhone's normal battery life
  • Up to 8 hours of talking, 8 hours of web browsing, or 255 of standby time
  • Access to all ports
  • Kickstand to prop up phone for video viewing
  • Supports charging and synching with included USB cord
  • LED power indicator
  • On and off power switch
  • Changeable frame
  • Condition: new
  • One-year limited warranty from Mota
  • Voltage: Input: 5.0V/1.0A (max); Output: 5.0 ± 0.25V/1A

In the box: extended battery case, two frames, USB charging cable, and user manual

deals.pitchHtml:
Merkury Innovations Universal Smartphone Windshield Car Mount

Merkury Innovations' universal smartphone mount clings to the windshield or dashboard of any automobile. Once in place, the mount embraces nearly any smartphone—as well as other mobile gadgets such as MP3 players—with arms that conform to device dimensions. It then pivots your phone into either a vertical or horizontal position. Multiple adjustment knobs fine-tune things even further, letting you find the optimal viewing angle and height. The suction-cup base keeps devices stable even when going over speed bumps or off-roading through geyser fields. Despite this strong hold, the mount easily can be removed so you can transition between vehicles.

  • Car mount compatible with most smartphones
  • Mounts to windshields and dashboards
  • Vertical or horizontal viewing angle
  • Suction-cup mount won't leave a hickey
  • Multiple adjustment knobs
  • Works with any vehicle
  • Simple installation and removal
  • Weight: 5 oz.
  • Dimensions: 5"x4"x2.5"
  • Condition: new
  • One-year warranty from Merkury Innovations

Cassini Astronomical Catadioptric Reflector Telescope (CS-102)

Cassini takes the headache out of putting together the Astronomical Catadioptric Reflector telescope by preassembling its steel tripod, which has extendable legs and retractable feet for firm stability. Once the telescope’s optical tube assembly is secured within the mount’s clamps, stargazers use the slow-motion altitude controls to adjust the telescope in precise movements. The Cassini Mars’ Eye electronic finderscope provides a more expansive view of the sky so users have an easier time spotting stars, planets, and Babe Ruth homeruns still in orbit. The erecting eyepiece flips the telescope’s gaze right-side-up for land viewing.

  • Telescope for star and terrestrial viewing
  • Great gift for special occasions including Father's Day
  • Diffraction limited optical tube assembly with 1,100mm focal length
  • Multi-coated catadioptric correcting lens
  • Heavy-duty metal primary and secondary mirror cells
  • 102mm primary mirror cell with push and pull collimation screws
  • Cassini Mars’ Eye electronic finderscope
  • 1.25” rack and pinion focuser
  • Cassini Super Glide altitude-azimuth yoke mount with adjustable clamp, adjustable counter weights, and slow-motion controls
  • Pre-assembled steel tripod with retractable rubber feet and accessory tray
  • Three 1.25” eye pieces:
    • 1.5x erecting eyepiece
    • 6mm eyepiece
    • 20mm eyepiece
  • Cassini Planetarium CD-ROM with photos and audio explanation of the images
  • Weight: 26 lbs.
  • Dimensions: 36” (L) x 36” (W) x 60” (H)

Garmin nüvi 2455LMT 4.3-Inch GPS with Lifetime Maps and Traffic

Preloaded with maps and millions of points of interest throughout the United States, Canada, and Mexico, the nüvi acts as a personal tour guide with voice-prompted turn-by-turn directions that direct drivers around most of North America. Its 4.3-inch display features an intuitive touchscreen interface that lets drivers do everything from scroll through lists of nearby restaurants to analyze digital elevation maps of surrounding terrain. The nüvi’s free lifetime maps and traffic updates help ensure calculated routes take into account newly built roads, construction detours, and tunnels occupied by hibernating dragons.

  • 4.3'' display with intuitive touchscreen interface
  • Free lifetime maps and 3-D traffic updates
  • Preloaded with City Navigator North America NT, which includes maps and more than 8 million of points of interest for the United States, Canada, Mexico, Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands, Cayman Islands, and the Bahamas
  • Speed limit indicator displays speed limits for most major roads
  • Lane assist with photoReal junction views
  • Park position recall helps prevent getting lost in large parking lots
  • Voice-prompted turn-by-turn directions
  • microSD slot (card not included) for installing extra maps and custom voices
  • Rechargeable lithium-ion battery with up to 2.5 hours of life
  • Dimensions: 4.8”x2.9”x0.6”; 5 ounces
  • One-year warranty from Garmin
  • Condition: manufacturer refurbished

deals.pitchHtml:
Serta Perfect Sleeper Larkdale Firm Mattress Set

The official mattress of the National Sleep Foundation, Serta’s Perfect Sleeper is designed to alleviate five common sleep problems:

1. Tossing and Turning

The Perfect Sleeper is topped with a layer of contouring Cool Twist gel memory foam that eliminates pressure points and enhances cushioning.

2. Lack of Support

Proper support throughout the night can reduce the odds of waking with aches and pains. An advanced support system—the DuoCore Individually Wrapped inner spring—dwells at the mattress core, along with a gremlin that, one dark and stormy night, will emerge from the mattress and recite a riddle that you must answer correctly.

3. Sleeping Too Hot or Too Cold

On the sleep surface, Cool Fabric technology helps to regulate heat and moisture. Inside the mattress, Cool Twist gel memory foam maximizes airflow to keep sleepers cool.

4. Motion Transfer

DuoCore Individually Wrapped coils inside the mattress help isolate movements. When you have to get up in the middle of the night, you won’t disturb your partner or the full glass of red fruit punch you sleep with.

5. Mattress Sag or Roll-Off

Built to withstand years of sound slumber, Comfort Last construction resists mattress sag and roll-off, regardless of the sleeper's body type.

By the Numbers

  • Comfort Rating: 3-4 (on a scale of 1–10, with 1 being the firmest)
  • Includes Serta standard (9") or low-profile (6") box spring
  • Queen has option of one- or two-piece box springs; king and California king come with two-piece box springs
  • 12" fitted-sheet pocket depth
  • 20-year limited warranty
  • Designed and assembled in the USA
  • Manufacturer's FAQ page

Free White Glove delivery includes unpacking and basic setup of the mattress, as well as removal of boxes, packaging materials, and old mattress.

About Serta

In the 1930s, an assembly of independent mattress manufacturers joined forces to form a robust company with a focus on quality. From the outset, Serta's created originals, such as the first-ever tuftless inner-spring mattress. Continuing down that road, they introduced the Sertapedic in the 1950s with the tag line "You sleep ON it, not in it" in response to demand for firmer mattresses. Over the subsequent decades—as Serta innovated continuous inner springs, gel memory foam, and filling that felt just like sleeping on dodo feathers—the brand's commitment to quality and innovation never wavered. Today, their mattresses cradle sleepers in more than 100 countries.

How to get your goods: by purchasing this Groupon and providing your name, shipping address, phone number and email, your order is complete!

You will be contacted via phone to schedule delivery of your goods, and someone will need to be home to sign upon receipt.

deals.pitchHtml:
Bundle Contents

  • Xbox One console
  • Kinect sensor for Xbox One
  • Wireless controller
  • Chat headset
  • Titanfall game download; ESRB rating M for mature, the game contains blood and gore, strong language, violence, and online interactions
  • One-month Xbox Live Gold membership
  • HDMI cable
  • Power supply

Xbox One and Titanfall Bundle

Every Xbox One console includes the Kinect sensor, thus allowing it to recognize and respond naturally to your voice, movements, and gestures. Feel like playing a game? Tell it so. How about a movie or a TV show? You say it, the Xbox One listens. The state-of-the-art system combines a gaming OS and Windows OS, so no matter what kind of entertainment you're craving, there's no need to switch back and forth between your TV's various inputs. Access apps such as Skype, Netflix, and Pandora, or pop in a Blu-ray disc to enjoy the system's HD visuals. The system gets to know your preferences, and it tailors the homepage specifically to your personality, interests, and the level of trust you put in artificial intelligence. Also included with this bundle is a one-month Gold membership to Xbox Live, which connects you with players around the world. Titanfall, one of the Xbox One's flagship games, comes from one of the co-creators of Call of Duty, whose expertise in the realm of first-person shooters elevates this man vs. machine title into the stratosphere.

  • Next-level gaming system
  • Kinect sensor recognizes and responds to your voice and movements
  • Combines gaming OS with Windows OS
  • Customized home screen combines games, movies, and streaming apps
  • 8-core x86 processor
  • HDMI pass-thru lets you watch TV on your Xbox One
  • 8GB of RAM
  • 500GB hard drive
  • Instantly switch between games and entertainment apps
  • Integrated Blu-ray player
  • Titanfall game from Call of Duty co-creator
  • Automatic updates from Xbox Live
  • Three USB 3.0 ports
  • Wakes up instantly when you say "Xbox on" or "LOL, I'm talking to a computer"

Any price comparison is to a new, nonrefurbished product price.

Gateway 10.1" Notebook (Refurbished)

Incredibly light and just over an inch thick, this Gateway notebook is about as portable as a laptop can get. However, its convenient size doesn't detract from its visual or performing prowess. The 10-point touchscreen measures an 10.1" and glows with the colorful icons of the user-friendly Windows 8 operating system. Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint are included along with other essential programs, making this laptop ideal for students, business professionals, or struggling authors writing a book about spreadsheets.

  • Model number: LT41P05u
  • Slim, lightweight mobile PC
  • 1.46GHz Intel Celeron dual-core processor
  • 10.1" HD LED backlit display
  • 10-point touchscreen functionality
  • Windows 8

  • Includes Microsoft Office Home and Student 2013
  • Bluetooth 4.0
